element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm completes the information of a raster layer that has cells without data.The information to complete the cells without data is taken from an additional layer.
a) base layer; b) additional layer; c) filled layer.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: the layer with cells without data.

element.name: ADDITIONAL
element.text: The layer with additional data to complete the base layer

element.name: METHOD
element.text: the interpolation method to be used may be selected from the following: * Closest neighbor * Bilineal * Inverse Distance * Cubic Spline * B-spline
